archimate:Folder.name: 2. Logical Solution Architecture
archimate:Folder.documentation: Logical Solution Architecture describes these software components and the information flows and control flows among the components within the system. It results from allocating the functional components in the Conceptual SA to software components identified from requirements analysis and early design work. Software components may be open source, commercial off-the-shelf (COTS), or government off-the-shelf (GOTS) products, or custom code
